sentences.en: " Who was that fiddling here? " asked the gruff voiced soldier.
sentences.cn: 且听到有个哑嗓子问: “ 是什么人在此唱歌作乐?

sentences.en: A gruff voice jars on one's nerves.
sentences.cn: 粗声粗气的声音刺激人的神经.

sentences.en: Aunt Chloe set a chair for her in a manner decidedly gruff and crusty.
sentences.cn: 克罗大娘没好气地替她搬了把椅子.

sentences.en: Beneath his gruff exterior he's really very kind - hearted.
sentences.cn: 他外表粗鲁,心地却十分善良.

sentences.en: Beneath his gruff exterior, he's really very kind-hearted.
sentences.cn: 他外表冷漠，心地却十分善良。

sentences.en: Don't take it personally, cabbies are known to be gruff in Australia.
sentences.cn: 不要亲自, 司机都知道,在澳大利亚粗野.

sentences.en: He could be gruff and monosyllabic.
He gave me a gruff look.
sentences.cn: 他态度生硬地看了我一眼.

sentences.en: He hid his feelings behind a gruff abruptness.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的感情隐藏在生硬鲁莽之中.

sentences.en: He picked up the phone expecting to hear the chairman's gruff voice.
sentences.cn: 他拿起电话等着听主席那粗哑的声音。

sentences.en: He was short, gruff and fiery.
sentences.cn: 他身材矮小, 性情乖戾暴躁.

sentences.en: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
sentences.cn: 他粗暴的外表下藏着一颗非常善良的心。

sentences.en: His manner can be rather gruff.
sentences.cn: 他的态度有时候很生硬。

sentences.en: His speaking voice, a gruff husky tenor, added to the impression of fractiousness he conveyed.
sentences.cn: 他说话的声音, 又粗又大的男高音, 增添了他给人的性情暴戾的印象.

sentences.en: Mr. Barkis seemed gruff and answered dryly.
sentences.cn: 巴奇斯先生的样子好象有气似的,回答的口气也很冷淡.

sentences.en: Simultaneously I heard his voice, gruff, muffled, husky, at the hall telephone.
sentences.cn: 就在同时我听见了他的声音, 粗犷 、 低沉 、 沙哑, 正在用门廓的电话与什么人通着话.

sentences.en: That's less gruff than we talk here, and softer.
sentences.cn: 比起我们这儿讲话来,只有那么粗声粗气的, 比较柔和些.

trans.tran_cn: （声音）粗哑的，生硬的，（人的行为）冷淡的，态度生硬的
trans.tran_en: speaking in a rough unfriendly voice
